Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 93 Filed 12/10/20 Page 38 of 91 38

1    that you have a written statement and then that there is an
2    alleged victim who wishes to be heard. Is that correct?
3    MS. MOE: That is correct, your Honor.
4    THE COURT: Why don't you begin with the written statement and then after that you can identify, as you like,
5    the alleged victim who wishes to be heard, and my staff will
6    unmute at that time that person so that they can be heard.
7    Go ahead.
8    MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor.
9    As I mentioned before, your Honor, the government has
10   received a written statement from a victim who prefers to be
11   referred to as Jane Doe today in order to protect her privacy.
12   The following are the words of Jane Doe which I will read from
13   her written statement.
14   Jane Doe wrote:
15   "I knew Ghislaine Maxwell for over ten years. It was
16   her calculating and sadistic manipulation that anesthetized me,
17   in order to deliver me, with full knowledge of the heinous and
18   dehumanizing abuse that awaited me, straight to the hands of
19   Jeffrey Epstein. Without Ghislaine, Jeffrey could not have
20   done what he did. She was in charge. She egged him on and
21   encouraged him. She told me of others she recruited and she
22   thought it was funny. She pretends to care only to garner
23   sympathy, and enjoys drawing her victims in with perceived
24   caring, only to entrap them and make them feel some sense of
25   SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00001915

THE COURT: Why don't you begin with the written statement and then after that you can identify, as you like, the alleged victim who wishes to be heard, and my staff will unmute at that time that person so that they can be heard. Go ahead. MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor. As I mentioned before, your Honor, the government has received a written statement from a victim who prefers to be referred to as Jane Doe today in order to protect her privacy. The following are the words of Jane Doe which I will read from her written statement. Jane Doe wrote: "I knew Ghislaine Maxwell for over ten years. It was her calculating and sadistic manipulation that anesthetized me, in order to deliver me, with full knowledge of the heinous and dehumanizing abuse that awaited me, straight to the hands of Jeffrey Epstein. Without Ghislaine, Jeffrey could not have done what he did. She was in charge. She egged him on and encouraged him. She told me of others she recruited and she thought it was funny. She pretends to care only to garner sympathy, and enjoys drawing her victims in with perceived caring, only to entrap them and make them feel some sense of
